Parameters

verbose – prints loop iteration number.

Instances n input neurons where n is the amount of neurons to represent the total number of question indices in binary form.

class learner.carlos_ann.NetworkParam(n_hidden=40, n_epoch=3, weight_updates='hebbian', t_max=None)[source]¶
Parameters

  • weight_updates – string in [“random”, “hebbian”, “recanatesi”]

  • t_max – int as in the model_simulation script. None when no simulation script is being used with the model

class learner.carlos_ann.Neuron(neuron_id, role, tau=0.01, theta=0, gamma=0.4, kappa=13000, phi=1, input_neurons=None, current=0)[source]¶
Parameters

  • input_neurons – list of neuron_id connected to this neuron

  • tau – decay time

  • theta – gain function threshold

  • gamma – gain func exponent. Always sub-linear, then value < 1

  • kappa – excitation parameter

  • phi – inhibition parameter in range(0.70, 1.06)

Modified from Recanatesi (2015) equations 1 to 4. Note: default argument values are the reference values in the article but for phi; only phi_min and phi_max are given in Recanatesi (2015).

multi-line string of instance attributes
